RelatedSentence: The Cigna agreement includes a pay - for - quality arrangement that rewards Tenet ( NYSE : THC ) hospitals for improved quality of care and cost efficiency .
During the first year , that will be based on national quality measures established by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services .
Last year , Tenet struck a deal valued at $ 4.3 billion to acquire Nashville - based Vanguard Health Systems which operates several hospitals in San Antonio .
